thread.title: UPPAbaby 2015 G-Luxe Stroller in Maya Marigold
thread.title_full: UPPAbaby 2015 G-Luxe Stroller in Maya Marigold

title: UPPAbaby 2015 G-Luxe Stroller in Maya Marigold
text: Uppababy 2015 g-Luxe Stroller in Maya Marigold Stroller   Feed Services   Tilt back. Move forward.Say hello to lightness without saying goodbye to functionality. Comfortable and agile, the G-LUXE is feature-packed yet nothing has to weigh you down. Life moves fast, and the G-LUXE moves with you. One-handed recline and adjustable footrestFlexibility every parent needs! Whether running errands or catching the sights during naptime, your child can sleep comfortably in our reclining seat with adjustable footrest. Easy to remove fabrics + seat pad The G-LUXE fabric and seat pad are removable and machine washable. We understand that spills happen. (To make life easier, your stroller is still usable while your seat pad is in the wash.) Extendable SPF 50+ sunshadeOur pull out sunshade extends to shield your child from harmful UV rays, allowing you and your child to enjoy the sunniest of days together. Easy to fold and stands on its ownOur hand-level triggers make it easy to fold the G-LUXE with just your fingers, no foot action required!
